name: Tello FPV Demo - Control App for Ryze Tello RTH VR
description: *** This is not the full version but a demo for you to test compatibility before you buy ***  This is a free demo version of the TelloFPV app. It allows you to test if your particular phone and controller setup is compatible with TelloFPV before buying the full app.  Please consider this is a courtesy for you when rating the app, and rate fair according to functionality provided vs. what is present in the original Tello App.  If you are asking for obstacle avoidance, GPS, or a Gimbal please buy a full size drone.    Please read the PDF manual available under menu => help!   As a demo version it carries the following restrictions compared to the full app: * Max altitude is 2m * Only one photo is stored, overwriting previous photos * Only one set of photos for panorama stitching is stored * Only one short video is stored, overwriting previous videos * Expires after 10 flights, or 5 days after installation   If you are happy with what the app does please buy the full version. And dont forget to leave positive rating and review not only for the full version but also for this DEMO version!  A low rating doesnt help fixing your problems so please drop me a line instead: tellofpv@gmail.com   ####################  TelloFPV is the app to control the Ryze Tello drone  Lots of advanced features not present in the original app!  +controls Tello using oscreen, wired or bluetooth controllers + decent video quality  + trainer mode (student controller + master controller) + Special PANIC button to stop Tello anytime  * Onboard Visual Positioning System VPS  * Return to home  * circle / orbit with configurable distance and speed * Lock heading on a point of interest  * Enhanced telemetry (distance, altitude, pitch & roll indicators) * Home indicator showing you the way back home * Flight log * Advanced video stream & recording options  * Two flight profiles: Sport and video mode for fast & quick drone or smooth video recording * Wired or wireless gamepad controller  * Gamesir T1s and Parrot Flypad ! * Control of stick & button mapping  * Fine tuning each stick axis * Support for VR goggles  * Translations for IT, EN, DE, ES, FR (PT coming soon)   Tello is sensitive to RF noise on the wifi band it uses, which causes video to stutter or show pixelation / compression artifacts. To get best video feed & recordings please review the detailed information i the manual.   Known defects * Android 10 user: Android 10 broke bluetooth networking. Many devices just dont connect anymore. There is nothing the app can do about this. You have to wait for Google to fix this in their Android system.    Required privileges * Storage - saving photos and videos * Location - scanning for bluetooth controllers    All product names, logos, and brands are property of their respective owners. All company, product and service names used in this website are for identification purposes only. Use of these names, logos, and brands does not imply endorsement.
